name: Koha-jobs
body:
## About Koha

[Koha](https://koha-community.org/) is the first free software library automation package. In use worldwide, its development is steered by a growing community of users collaborating to achieve their technology goals. Kohaâ€™s feature set continues to evolve and expand to meet the needs of its user base.

## New jobs

* [Goethe-Institut Chile](http://www.goethe.de/ins/cl/de/sao/uun/ste.html)

## About this site

Updating this site is up to YOU! Found a Koha job posting? Send a pull request!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
